Question
========

Variables X and Y were measured in 50 individuals. The results were put into a scatterplot accompanied by the regression line of Y on X.\ When X increases by 1, Y will increase on average by:

![](uva-intercept-1225-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 0,8
* 1,1
* 1,2
* 1,3

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,8: Incorrect
* 1.1: Incorrect
* 1,2: Correct
* 1.3: Incorrect
